features: This stunning haaram features five strands of meticulously strung ruby beads, enhanced with intricately crafted elephant motifs set with polki diamonds and emeralds. description: This Rajaputana Ruby Bead Polki Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's an investment in artistry and heritage.
